answers.answer: Could be. I have all the same things except I have extreme swelling all over my body and sudden rapid weight gain. They've checked me for preeclampsia 3 times in the past 2 weeks and they all say I don't have it. Some people's bodies just don't handle pregnancy well ha... But have your dr test you at your next apt just incase (:

Usually warning signs of "bad" swelling are above the neck, but I would deffinetly talk to your doctor about the headaches and vision changes.I've had a lot of cramping the last 5 days, I'm 36+3 days so unless there's no bleeding it's normal.

question: I'm 37 weeks and just a few days ago I noticed my ankles are starting to swell...I'm not on my feet a lot as I work in an office at a desk, and I've since started having light white spots in my vision and small headaches here and there...I've also delt with a lot of cramping but no bleeding or discharge...the last few checks my blood pressure has been slightly higher then usual but not a lot...Does anyone know what could be causing this?
title: Possible preeclampsia?
